title-group.article-title: COLLECTIVE MEMORIES IN THE BALTIC SEA REGION AND BEYOND: NATIONALTRANSNATIONAL -EUROPEAN?

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 2008 The Association for the Advancement of Baltic Studies
